scripts.start: npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.clean: cd backend && docker compose down -v && cd ../frontend && rd /s /q .cache build node_modules
scripts.schema:snapshot: docker compose -f backend/docker-compose.yml exec directus npx directus schema snapshot /directus/snapshots/schema.yaml && docker cp recraft-space-directus:/directus/snapshots/schema.yaml backend/snapshots/schema.yaml
scripts.schema:apply:local: docker cp backend/snapshots/schema.yaml recraft-space-directus:/directus/snapshots/schema.yaml && docker compose -f backend/docker-compose.yml exec directus npx directus schema apply /directus/snapshots/schema.yaml --yes
scripts.seed: docker compose -f backend/docker-compose.yml exec directus node /directus/scripts/seed.cjs
